p: In addition to being a potential source of novel antimicrobials, plants also play an important role in chemotherapy and represent a promising source of anticancer agents. However, the use of herbal products should be based on scientific validation‚ as the traditional use of any plant for medicinal purposes, by no means, guarantees the safety of the plant or treatment. Toxicity testing can identify any such risk that may be associated with herbal usage, therefore avoiding their potential short term or long term negative effects‚ when used as medicine [ 12].
